node.title: NT records no new cases linked to outbreak as Territorians await exposure site details
node.alt: a multi-storey hospital building with a sign saying pandemic clinic visible
node.description: The Northern Territory records one new COVID-19 case overnight, a traveller who arrived on a repatriation flight from Johannesburg, as Territorians await an update on key exposure site information after two people who visited Royal Darwin Hospital tested positive on Wednesday.
node.content:
["The Northern Territory has recorded\u00a0one new COVID-19 case overnight.", "The case is not\u00a0linked to the current outbreak.\u00a0", "The new case, a traveller who arrived on a repatriation flight from Johannesburg, tested positive inside Howard Springs.", "The total number of cases linked to the Northern Territory's current outbreak remains at 94.", "Yesterday, the NT\u00a0recorded four\u00a0cases linked to the current outbreak, including two Timber Creek residents \u2014 a mother and her son \u2014\u00a0who tested positive at Royal Darwin Hospital.", "Acting Chief Minister Nicole Manison yesterday said a\u00a0list of exposure sites linked to the\u00a0Timber Creek cases would\u00a0be released later on Wednesday.", "The NT government is still yet to release any details about new exposure sites.", "The full list of all current NT public exposure sites\u00a0can be found on the NT government's coronavirus\u00a0website.", "Today is\u00a0the first day\u00a0this week the NT government has\u00a0not held a press conference to provide an update on the unfolding\u00a0COVID-19 situation in the Northern Territory.", "The NT Opposition criticised the government for not fronting a press conference,\u00a0saying it was putting \"its own interests ahead of Territorians\" after the government yesterday scrapped controversial border rules following widespread backlash.", "\"The government has questions to answer about the movements of a woman and her baby who travelled from Timber Creek to Darwin, via Katherine, and are COVID-positive,\" Opposition Leader Gerard Maley said.", "\"That information is yet to be made public and it's a serious concern.\"\u00a0", "Earlier this week, the NT recorded its record daily rise in case numbers.", "On Tuesday night, after two new remote\u00a0cases were confirmed, the remote communities of\u00a0Kalkarindji, Daguragu, Timber Creek and Gilwi were placed\u00a0into lockouts that are scheduled to end at 2pm Friday.", "Wastewater testing in\u00a0Tennant Creek continues to return a positive result, the NT government said.", "Authorities have expressed concern over low testing and vaccination levels in Tennant Creek after positive wastewater was first detected in the town last weekend", "A mask mandate\u00a0is in place in Tennant Creek until 2pm Friday.", "\"It is important everyone in Tennant Creek gets tested for COVID-19, regardless of symptoms or recent travel,\" the NT government said today.", "A drive-through testing\u00a0facility, located at the Greyhound Transit Centre on Paterson Street,\u00a0is open in the town from 7am to 2pm.", "Just under\u00a03,200 COVID-19 tests were processed across the NT yesterday, the NT government said.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
